bibl.title: Quarrying for Rome: Glimpses behind the Scenes in Egypt's Eastern Desert.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Adam Bülow-Jacobsen (Edited with translation and commentary by), Mons Claudianus. Ostraca graeca et latina. IV. The Quarry-Texts. O. Claud. 632-896 = Documents de fouilles. 47 (Le Caire, 2009).
bibl.seg: J. Clayton Fant, Quarrying for Rome: Glimpses behind the Scenes in Egypt's Eastern Desert.
